course_description:
This course takes a broad-based look at poker theory and applications of poker analytics to investment management and trading.

This course is offered during the {{% resource_link "5f699e45-9f93-4746-996b-f57be8e9c7ec" "Independent Activities Period (IAP)" %}}, which is a special 4-week term at MIT in January. IAP provides members of the MIT community including students, faculty, staff, and alums with an opportunity to organize, sponsor and participate in a wide variety of activities and topics that are often outside of the regular MIT curriculum.

**Faculty Advisor**: Paul Mende
title: Course Metadata
